articles.author: Avni Arya
articles.title: Bengaluru's 'Proper Dosa' Makes MasterChef Australia Judge Gary Mehigan Say 'I'll Be Back...' - Times Now
articles.description: Mehigan shared his food adventure on Instagram, praising the 'proper' dosa at Rameshwaram Cafe. He enjoyed ragi dosa, ghee roast dosa, medu vada, ghee idli podi, kesari baath, and relished some excellent filter coffee.
articles.content: Expressing his love for the place, Mehigan gave a shout-out to Rameshwaram Cafe and expressed his intention to return. (@garymehigan/Instagram)
